  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditablePersonController

    Interface that define EditablePersonController.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli

      • getEditableRecord

        java.lang.Object getEditableRecord()
        Returns a generic user, it may be an admin or a custmer.

      • doRegisterUser

        void doRegisterUser(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String surname,
                  java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  java.util.Calendar birthDate)
        Method that manages and controls the registration of a new generic user.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the user.
        surname - the surname of the user.
        username - the identification code of the user.
        password - the password chosen from the user.
        birthDate - birth date of the user.

        Parameters:
        name - the actor's name
        surname - the actor's surname
        nazionality - the actor's nationality
        birthDate - the actor's birthdate
